text: Inga Margaretha "Med" Ida Reventberg (7 June 1948 – 24 June 2021) was a Swedish actress, short movie director, and theatre manager. She was born in Nyköping. In the 1970s, she was a member of the leftist theater and music group Nationalteatern. After being active in several other Swedish theatres, she headed the Västerbotten theatre from 2005 on. Reventberg appeared in many Swedish movies and television productions, mostly in minor roles. Reventberg died on 24 June 2021, at the age of 73. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1948 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Swedish movie actors Category:Swedish television actors Category:Swedish stage actors Category:Swedish movie directors
title: Med Reventberg
